DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response regarding the details of the activities or procedures undertaken in active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes. Interventions include but are not restricted to drugs, cells and other biological products, surgical procedures, radiologic procedures, devices, behavioral treatments, process-of-care changes, and preventive care.

Concepts.definition: A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.

Property.preferredDefinition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.
